casebody.data:
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, f/k/a the Bank of New York as Successor Trustee to JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A., as Trustee for the Holders of the Sami II Trust 2006-AR7, Mortgage Pass-Through Certificates, Series 2006-AR7; and Nationstar Mortgage, LLC, Appellants,
v.
CKVC INVESTMENTS, LLC; and Southern Highlands Community Association, Respondents. No. 77495 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JANUARY 11, 2019

Dismissed.
